title: Signet Ring Bearing the Name Ramesses II
description:
Bronze signet ring, cast solid in one piece, inscribed for Rameses II. 
Condition: Small chips and some corrosion. There is a small crack which has been mended.
section: The Late Eighteenth Dynasty and the Ramesside Period

museum_location.name: 19th Dynasty to Roman Period, Martha A. and Robert S. Rubin Gallery, 3rd Floor
